issue.title: Executing hx_connect() from standalone computer running MATLAB R2014b API causes MATLAB to crash

content.raw:
This does appear to happen every time now. There was only one session where I was able to use a standalone MATLAB API to control Gazebo (this was with MATLAB R2014a. I reported the ring finger hyperextension issue: Issue #65. Now, MATLAB R2014a also crashes on execution of hx_connect()). My apologies, I do not recall what version of Gazebo we had running at the time.

Below is a MATLAB R2014b crash dump report.


```

I reported the ring finger hyperextension issue: Issue #65. Now, MATLAB R2014a also crashes on execution of hx_connect()).
